channel.title: [help] simple uploading turns not so simple -.-''
channel.description:
i finnaly got my server's ip and everything correct, now im trying to upload it to my forums as a beta version for me and my staff and friends. whenever i try and upload it ANYWHERE ( mediafire, megaupload, uppit ) it gets to about 100% which takes an hour and then it says failure to upload due to error #501... and i cant figure it out, any different way to upload, or fix this? >.<
[edit] ive tried for the past 2 days around 13 hours on just uploading my client :(

item.title: [help] simple uploading turns not so simple -.-''

item.description:
@MarijanepkzOwner wrote:

it is a normal client, with a run.bat. it’s just not uploading and that means no one can play my server :’(
